heif.boxes

Class ItemPropertyAssociationBox.ItemPropertyEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.ItemPropertyAssociationBox.ItemPropertyEntry
  • Enclosing class:
    ItemPropertyAssociationBox

    public static class ItemPropertyAssociationBox.ItemPropertyEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single item's property associations in the ipma box.

      • ItemPropertyEntry

        public ItemPropertyEntry(int itemID,
                         int count)
        Constructs an ItemPropertyEntry with the specified item ID and number of associations.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the identifier of the item
        count - the number of property associations for this item

    • Method Detail

      • setAssociation

        public void setAssociation(int index,
                           boolean essential,
                           int propertyIndex)
        Sets the association at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index to set
        essential - true if the property is essential; otherwise, false
        propertyIndex - the 1-based index of the property in the ipco box
